abstract: HGTV and the Food Network are back on AT&T’s U-serve television system after an almost three-day-long outage.
snippet: HGTV and the Food Network are back on AT&T’s U-serve television system after an almost three-day-long outage.
lead_paragraph: HGTV and the Food Network are back on AT&T’s U-serve television system after an almost three-day lapse.

headline.main: Food Network and HGTV Back on AT&T System
